statements: DELETE FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE article_title = 'Example Article'
DELETE FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE article_id = 100 AND bias_level = 'Low';
DELETE FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE reference_article_id = (SELECT article_id FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'High') AND article_title LIKE '%controversy%';
DELETE FROM article WHERE title = 'Breaking News';
DELETE FROM bias_level WHERE article_id = 123 AND bias_level = 'high';
DELETE FROM article_sources WHERE source_id = 10 AND article_id = 3;
